task.role: You are a Senior Security Engineer with expertise in authentication and secure coding. Implement Task 6 with production-quality code.

context.overview: Implement rate limiting for authentication endpoints to prevent abuse
context.background: Review PRD and architecture in .tasks/docs/ for full context.

requirements.description: 1. Configure express-rate-limit with Redis store 2. Create different limits: login (5 attempts/15min), signup (3 attempts/hour), password reset (3 attempts/hour) 3. Implement IP-based and user-based rate limiting 4. Add custom error messages for rate limit exceeded 5. Setup rate limit headers in responses

constraints.constraint: PR title: feat(task-6): Setup rate limiting middleware

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Test rate limiting triggers correctly and resets after time window
